column4: with apt-get is their a search switch? I'm coming from gentoo and i'm spoiled w/ portage
i quit gentoo on my 64bit arch because its very unstable
ubun was a dream compared too gentoo
the 32bit gentoo is good, just their 64 needs some more apps
oh, it doesn't matter really, but you might want it -march and not march
indeed, portage (emerge) is the best of the best
yeah, lets say gaim takes about 5 minutes to compile, but it's worth it, it has crashed on me like, once, in a year or so. and i use unstable
lol, you comfigure your own hardware on gentoo ;)
Yes, you must have used stage3? ewww...
did you go by the 2005.0 handbook ?
i haven't really read that one but i know it isn't that good, it is more easy and fast, but the other ones show you how to build your own kernel, which are more personal and a lot faster
g2g, if you want to chat, my channel is #gentoo-texas ......... and stage one takes a few hours on athlon 64, and i have 1 gig dual chan memory
